casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

September 12, 2008

[Cite as 09/12/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-Ohio-4599.J

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-1529. Fletcher v. Univ. Hosps. of Cleveland.

Cuyahoga App. No. 88573, 172 Ohio App.3d 153, 2007-Ohio-2778. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County. Upon consideration of the motion for leave of amicus curiae, Ohio Association of Civil Trial Attorneys, to participate in oral argument scheduled for Tuesday, September 30, 2008, in support of appellant,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted and amicus curiae shall share the time allotted to appellant.
